Sentencas: This work focuses on the development of a control and diagnosis-oriented model of a Solid Oxide Fuel Cell (SOFC) integrated system module (ISM).
Titulo: A versatile computational tool for model-based design, control and diagnosis of a generic Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Integrated Stack Module

Sentencas: Fuel cell researchers and developers are currently investing significant resources on such fuel cell-based energy conversion systems, as a consequence of their adaptability to a variety of applications and power size.
Titulo: A versatile computational tool for model-based design, control and diagnosis of a generic Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Integrated Stack Module

Sentencas: In this configuration, heat exchanges among components are difficult to manage and, consequently, reliable model-based tools are required to enhance the design phase.
Titulo: A versatile computational tool for model-based design, control and diagnosis of a generic Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Integrated Stack Module

Sentencas: Therefore, the main heat exchange mechanisms (including radiation, here modeled via view-factors-based approach) are evaluated by simplifying 3-D geometries, as well as assuming the outlet temperature from each component as its state variable.
Titulo: A versatile computational tool for model-based design, control and diagnosis of a generic Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Integrated Stack Module

Sentencas: The resulting lumped parameters model was proven effective in achieving the required compromise between accuracy and computational time, particularly in view of its real-world deployment for advanced balance of plant (BoP) analyses, as well as within control and diagnostic model-based tasks.
Titulo: A versatile computational tool for model-based design, control and diagnosis of a generic Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Integrated Stack Module

Sentencas: Moreover, the entire SOFC ISM model is generic and can be suitably applied to different layouts, through the characterization of main model parameters.
Titulo: A versatile computational tool for model-based design, control and diagnosis of a generic Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Integrated Stack Module

Sentencas: Simulation results are in agreement with experimental data collected on a non-conventional micro-CHP system, named HoTBox (TM), tested under nominal operating conditions within the EU funded project DIAMOND.
Titulo: A versatile computational tool for model-based design, control and diagnosis of a generic Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Integrated Stack Module
